Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Bedrock
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Bedrock texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Dirt texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Grass
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Grass texture to appear more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Cactus
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Cactus' top, side and bottom textures to appear more random.

overridemaster{Blooming Cactus}
incompat{Cactus Complete Pack}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Logs
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Logs top textures to appear more random. Also rotates the textures of Crimson and Warped Stems and Cherry and Mangrove Logs and Bamboo Blocks.

requiresefr

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Andesite
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Andesite textures in whole blocks, Slabs, Stairs and Walls to appear more random. Also fixes the side texture of Polished Andesite Slabs and Stairs.
